reviews.text: the hotel is very clean and nice looking, it is located in the middle of the city. the food is very good but does include water therefor you have to pay for your drinks every dinner and they charge the bottle for 1.5 turkish kira when you can get it outside for only 0.2!!!!
reviews.title: nice
Good hotel
reviews.text: they also dont have air conditaning in the gaming area and it was impossible spending anytime there due to the horroble heat! apperently they dont put their aircondition in the elevator as well! but after all we enjoed the hotel very much!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We really enjoyed staying in this hotel. Rooms are simple but clean, and staff helpful. The hotel is not huge, so all the food at the breakfast/dinner buffet is very well prepared, not mass produced like in places that cater for hundreds and hundreds.
reviews.title: Great hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Location is also great - short walk to the centre / harbour.
reviews.title: Good service and top location

reviews.text: We stayed here for a week in October. Staff was very helpful and friendly and speaks good english. The room was large and well cleaned. Great location overlooking the harbour, old Antalya at walking distance.
reviews.title: Decent Hotel, heart of the city, real flavor of old Antalya
Great staff, great value, great ammenities

reviews.text: I stayed at the Best Western Kahn with a national team attending a World Championships in Antalya. We were there for two weeks. The hotel is a pretty decent hotel, in an interesting part of the town, with a helpful staff, good food, and reasonable services.
reviews.title: Good value hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Came to the hotel on a rainy evening. affordable hotel. The staff were exellent.rooms very large and clean. tried the turkish hamam and bath. can higly recommend it. want to thank the staff for incredible service. stayed for three nights, not enough.
reviews.title: great hotel and great staff.

reviews.text: Hotel is in the city,but very close to the old port area. Just a few blocks away there are restaurants all over the place overlooking the port area and others dotted all over the place on the streets all around the port area. There is a small bazaar area very nearby. Prices appeared to be better than other location.
reviews.title: Excellent Location near the port.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel was better than average. Buffet dinner was good as far as buffet dinners go. I do not care for buffet dinners so when I say it was better than average, it means it was good for what it is. Much better can be had anywhere around the port. View from the hotel restaurant was nice.
reviews.title: great hotel, excellent service, great location

reviews.text: Buffet breakfast was much better than the average Turkish fare at other hotels.
reviews.title: Reasonably priced, well located

likes.disliked: — Absence of storage space for clothes

reviews.text: we stayed in the hotel for a week and we enjoyed it very much! the stuff was halpful and polite. the hotel is well located about 2 minutes walk from the city center and the old city, we rent a car and there is free parking.
reviews.title: Excellent Turkish bath experience

reviews.text: I chose the Best Western Kahn for it's value and location outside of the "all inclusive zone" All Inclusive = boring! I found the location of the BW Kahn to be ideal for walking to Kaleci area and Bazaars. There are thousands of restaurant options around the hotel for every budget.
reviews.title: Comfortable hotel

reviews.text: As previous reviewers stated the hotel is clean, the staff are cordial and courteous, free wifi, business lounge with pc's and printers, great breakfast buffet and the pool area is nice too!
reviews.title: satisfactory

reviews.text: enjoyed myself alot helpful staff good food all one would wish for while on holiday would really recomend it as its just in the centre of things so thanks to all the staff for a wonderful time
reviews.title: Very nice hotel, great location

reviews.text: I stayed in this hotel in a very hot time in Antalya, Eeverything were great and I got value of my money. Hotel is in city center and close to all necessary area like commeercial,shopping and old town. Room was clean, breakfast was perfect, I slept deeply on my ortopedic bed.As a result Best western khan hotel is the only place to stay in city.
reviews.title: Too hot.
